content.html: Your 9-5 is because of unions. Your lunch break? Unions. Holiday pay? Unions. Sick pay? Unions. Health and safety requirements? Unions. Work condition requirements? Unions. Mat/Pat/adoption/foster leave? Unions. Any shred of workplace autonomy. Unions.
content.value:
Your 9-5 is because of unions.
Your lunch break? Unions.
Holiday pay? Unions.
Sick pay? Unions.
Health and safety requirements? Unions.
Work condition requirements? Unions.
Mat/Pat/adoption/foster leave? Unions.
Any shred of workplace autonomy. Unions.
